name: Legendary Node
title: Blood Rage
description: Killing a Bleeding enemy has 10% chance to grant Berserking for 5 seconds. Your damage is increased by x10% of your Damage while Berserking bonus, up to a maximum x30%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Bone Breaker
description: Every 12 seconds, your next Skill is guaranteed to Overpower.

name: Legendary Node
title: Carnage
description: While Berserking, Critical Strikes increase your Attack Speed by +2%, up to +16% for 6 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Decimator
description: Each time you make an enemy Vulnerable, your damage is increased by x10% for 5 seconds. Overpowering a Vulnerable enemy grants an additional x10% bonus for 5 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Flawless Technique
description: Damaging enemies with One-Handed Weapons increases your Critical Strike chance by x1% for 4 seconds, up to x8%. This can only happen once per Skill cast, or twice per second while channeling Whirlwind.

name: Legendary Node
title: Force of Nature
description: Your Earthquakes have a 75% chance to spawn a Dust Devil every second that deals [X] damage. Earthquake damage is increased by 30% of your Damage vs Close bonus, up to a maximum of 150%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Hemorrhage
description: Your Bleeding damage is increased by x15% of your Vulnerable Damage Bonus, up to a maximum of x45%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Warbringer
description: For every 75 Fury you spend, gain 15% of your Maximum Life as Fortify.

name: Legendary Node
title: Weapons Master
description: Swapping weapons grants you 8% of your Maximum Fury.

name: Legendary Node
title: Ancestral Guidance
description: After spending 75 Spirit, you deal x40% increased damage for 5 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Constricting Tendrils
description: Lucky Hit: Nature Magic Skills have up to a 15% chance to entangle the enemy with vines, Immobilizing them for 2 seconds and Poisoning them for 150% of the Base damage dealt over 4 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Earthen Devastation
description: Your Earth Skills deal x10% increased Critical Strike Damage, increased by x20% of your Damage vs Crowd Controlled bonus, up to x60%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Heightened Malice
description: While there are 3 or more Poisoned enemies Nearby, you deal x45% increased damage.

name: Legendary Node
title: Inner Beast
description: After Shapeshifting, your Spirit costs are reduced by 5% for 10 seconds, up to 45%. If you reach 10 stacks, this bonus resets and reduces the Cooldown of your Ultimate Skill by 5 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Lust for Carnage
description: Critical Strikes with Werewolf Skills restore 2 Spirit and deal x50% increased damage.

name: Legendary Node
title: Survival Instincts
description: While in Werebear form, you deal x1% increased damage, up to x60%, for every 1% difference in current Life percent between you and the enemy.

name: Legendary Node
title: Thunderstruck
description: Storm Skills deal increased damage equal to x20% of your Damage vs Close and Damage vs Distant bonuses, up to x60%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Untamed
description: Casting a Companion Skill grants x20% increased Companion damage for 5 seconds, stacking up to x80%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Blood Begets Blood
description: Blood Orbs grant x10% increased damage, up to x50%, for 5 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Bloodbath
description: Deal x70% increased Overpower damage.

name: Legendary Node
title: Bone Graft
description: Hitting enemies with Bone Skills increases your damage by x1% and your Maximum Essence by 2 for 8 seconds, stacks up to x8% increased damage and 16 Maximum Essence.

name: Legendary Node
title: Cult Leader
description: Your Minions deal x40% increased damage for each x20% of Attack Speed Bonus they have, up to a maximum of 100% Attack Speed Bonus.

name: Legendary Node
title: Flesh-eater
description: Consuming 5 Corpses grants x40% increased damage for 6 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Frailty
description: Cursed enemies take x10% increased damage from you and your Minions. This bonus is increased by x10% each second they are Cursed, up to x40%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Hulking Monstrosity
description: Your Golem has x40% increased Maximum Life and deals x100% increased damage.

name: Legendary Node
title: Scent of Death
description: With at least 2 Corpses Nearby, you gain 15% Damage Reduction. With no Corpses Nearby, you deal x15% increased damage.

name: Legendary Node
title: Wither
description: Your Shadow damage over time effects have a x5% chance to deal x50% bonus damage each time they deal damage. This chance is increased by x2% and bonus damage is increased by x8% for each 60 Intelligence you have, up to 1200 Intelligence.

name: Legendary Node
title: Cheap Shot
description: You deal x5% increased damage for each Nearby enemy that is Crowd Controlled, up to x25%. A Nearby Staggered Boss provides the maximum bonus.

name: Legendary Node
title: Cunning Stratagem
description: Your non-damage Combo Point bonuses are increased by x33.33% when you spend 3 Combo Points.

name: Legendary Node
title: Danse Macabre
description: Casting a Mobility or Subterfuge Skill increases the damage of your next Skill by x50%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Deadly Ambush
description: You deal x22% increased Critical Strike Damage to enemies affected by your Trap Skills.

name: Legendary Node
title: Eldritch Bounty
description: When you attack with an Imbued Skill, you gain +3% Maximum Resistance and 20% increased damage for that Imbuement's element for 9 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Exploit Weakness
description: Lucky Hit: Hitting a vulnerable enemy has up to a 60% chance to increase your damage by x1% for 25 seconds, up to x25%. At 25 stacks the bonus remains for 6 seconds then expires.

name: Legendary Node
title: Leyrana's Instinct
description: When Inner Sight’s gauge becomes full, you gain +100% Dodge Chance for 2 seconds. Your Core Skills deal increased damage equal to x25% of your Core Skill Damage Bonus while Inner Sight’s gauge remains full, up to x35%.

name: Legendary Node
title: No Witnesses
description: Your Ultimate Skills gain an additional x10% damage from your Damage with Ultimate bonus, up to x45%, and grant this bonus to all Skills for 10 seconds when cast.

name: Legendary Node
title: Tricks of the Trade
description: Your Marksman Skills grant your Cutthroat Skills x25% increased damage for 8 seconds. Your Cutthroat Skills grant your Marksman Skills x25% increased damage for 8 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Burning Instinct
description: Your Burning damage is increased by x10% of your Critical Strike Damage Bonus, plus x2% for every 30 Intelligence you have, up to x90%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Ceaseless Conduit
description: Crackling Energy has a 25% chance to not consume a Charge when triggered. Crackling Energy's damage is increased by x2% per 25 total Intelligence you have, up to x120%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Elemental Summoner
description: Your Conjuration Skills have x10% reduced Cooldown or Mana cost. They also deal bonus damage equal to x10% of the total amount of your Bonus Damage with Fire, Lightning, and Cold, up to x60%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Enchantment Master
description: Your Enchantments are 20% stronger.

name: Legendary Node
title: Frigid Fate
description: You deal bonus damage to Vulnerable enemies equal to x20% of the total amount of your Bonus Damage with Cold, up to a maximum of x60%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Fundamental Release
description: Each time you apply Vulnerable, Burning, or Critically Strike an enemy, they take x10% increased damage from you, up to x30%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Icefall
description: Your Frost skills deal x25% increased damage to Vulnerable enemies. This bonus is doubled if the enemy is also Frozen.

name: Legendary Node
title: Searing Heat
description: Pyromancy skills have a +12% increased Critical Strike Chance and deal increased Direct damage equal to 20% of your Damage with Fire bonus, up to x60%.

name: Legendary Node
title: Static Surge
description: After spending 100 Mana, your next cast of Chain Lightning or Charged Bolts makes enemies Vulnerable for 2 seconds and restores 10% of your Mana. This Mana cost requirement is reduced by Mana Cost Reduction bonuses.

name: Legendary Node
title: Bitter Medicine
description: When you Heal for 100% of your Maximum Life, deal [X] damage to Close enemies. This damage is increased by your Healing Received bonus.

name: Legendary Node
title: Convergence
description: You deal bonus damage equal to x20% of your 2 highest bonuses to damage types combined, up to 30% total.

name: Legendary Node
title: Drive
description: After moving 10 meters, you deal x3% increased damage for 10 seconds. This can stack up to 10 times.

name: Legendary Node
title: In-Fighter
description: When you Dodge or Block an attack you gain +2% increased Attack Speed and x1% increased Damage for 5 seconds, stacking up to 9 times.

name: Legendary Node
title: Revealing
description: Lucky Hit: Up to a 30% chance to Knock Down Vulnerable enemies. You deal x30% increased damage to Crowd Controlled enemies.

name: Legendary Node
title: Sapping
description: When you cast 3 Gorilla, Jaguar, Eagle, or Centipede skills with the same spirit in a row, restore 15% of your Vigor and deal x30% increased damage for 5 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Spiney Skin
description: When you use a Cooldown you gain 20% Thorns for 5 seconds.

name: Legendary Node
title: Viscous Shield
description: You do x1% increased damage for each 3% of your Maximum Life you have as a Barrier.
